meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ultimate.
meanings.sent1: Her ultimatenesses in decision-making always led to the best outcomes.
meanings.sent2: The ultimatenesses of his dedication to the project were truly admirable.
meanings.sent3: The ultimatenesses of the situation made everyone laugh at the unexpected turn of events.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was the ultimatenesses that held their relationship together.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset captured the ultimatenesses of nature's perfection.

meanings.definition: The ultimate nature or essence of something.
meanings.sent1: The ultimatenesses of the problem became clear after thorough analysis.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the ultimatenesses of the theory required deep reflection.
meanings.sent3: The ultimatenesses of the mystery novel kept readers guessing until the very end.
meanings.sent4: In his art, he aimed to capture the ultimatenesses of human emotion.
meanings.sent5: The scientist sought to uncover the ultimatenesses of the universe through his research.
